document.full_text: with the spirit of injured nathan horton alive in the arena, the bruins continued their dominant play, shutting out the canucks and evening the stanley cup finals at 2 games each.
document.title: bruins 4, canucks 0: bruins shut out canucks and even stanley cup finals
lines_and_colors: with the spirit of injured nathan horton alive in the arena, the bruins continued their dominant play, shutting out the canucks and evening the stanley cup finals at 2 games each.
